entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:46 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
